name: Orniraptor
description: The Orniraptor is a small creature with notable agility and a unique defensive trait stemming from its caustic blood.
memorable: It can retaliate with acid damage when injured and shares awareness with other Orniraptors.
goals: Often serves as a nuisance in combat, leveraging its mobility and tactical cohesion.
relations: Works collectively with other Orniraptors for enhanced situational awareness.
environment: Typically found in skirmish scenarios, potentially in groups.
strengths: Possesses the ability to inflict damage through retaliation and cooperative tactics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and wisdom, leading to vulnerabilities in manipulation and ambush situations.
attacks: Can use a melee Peck attack for piercing damage or a ranged Spit Stone for bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Spurt, which retaliates against attackers with acid damage when injured.
senses: Has poor vision, only seeing creatures in motion, making it susceptible to ambush.
additional_information: Collective Perception allows for shared awareness among Orniraptors.
Relies on instinct and collective awareness for communication.
Vulnerable to focused attacks due to average hit points and armor class.
Encourages cautious engagement due to its retaliatory Blood Spurt ability.
Limited to basic instincts, lacking in cognitive and perceptive capabilities.
test_queries: fast skirmisher that retaliates when injured
coordinated attacks from a group of Orniraptors
mobile creature with poor vision and acid defense
nimble monster that attacks when hurt
